Replace.Text: Going into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]ALL your [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of your {1_Desc} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose your [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of your {1_Desc} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Turn(s)[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of {1_CityName} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of your {1_Desc} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of a [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in {1_CityName} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige[ENDCOLOR]
The loss of your {1_Desc} has caused you to [COLOR_DARK_AGE]lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_DARK_AGE]Dark Age has Dawned![ENDCOLOR]
Disaster! Your citizens have been unhappy with your rule for so long that your civilization enters a Dark Age!
[COLOR_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age has Dawned![ENDCOLOR]
Congratulations! Your citizens have been happy with your rule for so long that your civilization enters a Golden Age!
A Dark Age ends!
Your recent [ICON_DARK_AGE] Dark Age has ended.
A Golden Age ends!
Your recent [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age has ended.
A Dark Age begins!
A [ICON_DARK_AGE] Dark Age has begun for our Civilization!
A Golden Age begins!
A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age has begun for our Civilization!
[COLOR_GOLDEN_AGE]Golden Age![ENDCOLOR]

Your civilization is in a [COLOR_DARK_AGE][ICON_DARK_AGE] DARK AGE![ENDCOLOR] While in a [ICON_DARK_AGE] Dark Age, your [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People rate is doubled but your Cities [ICON_FOOD] grow 25% slower. You will remain in a Dark Age until recover your [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
Your civilization is in a [COLOR_GOLDEN_AGE][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] GOLDEN AGE[ENDCOLOR] for {1_Num} more turns!
[ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} is LOST per turn from [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness!

[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} is [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]LOST[ENDCOLOR] from losing your: Capital (x5), Cities (x4), Citizens (x3), Units (x2), and Improvements (x1). ALL is [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]LOST[ENDCOLOR] if you fall into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Losing cities or your Capital will hasten your [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age's end.

If you lose MORE [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Prestige than you have stored, you will go into a [ICON_DARK_AGE] Dark Age! While in a [ICON_DARK_AGE] Dark Age, your [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People rate is doubled but your Cities [ICON_FOOD] grow 25% slower.

While in a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, every tile in your civilization that produces at least 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold produces 1 extra. Cities gain +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and civilization-wide [ICON_CULTURE] Culture is increased by 20%.
While in a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, every tile in your civilization that produces at least 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold produces 1 extra. Cities gain +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
[COLOR_GOLDEN_AGE]{1_NumCurrent}/{2_NumNeeded}[ENDCOLOR] Prestige towards your next [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

Cities will only grow at 2/4 normal speed while empire is [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Unhappy! [NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output is reduced by 2% for each point of Unhappiness. The same penalty applies to Units in combat!

Because [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness has reached 20, your civilization is is in revolt! Cities may abandon your empire and flip to the civilization that is most culturally influential over your people.

Because [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness has reached 10, your civilization is in unrest! Uprisings may occur with rebel (barbarian) units appearing in your territory. This will occur every few turns until you correct this situation!
